subproject.corporate outcome: Knowledge for human development in the Arab region strengthened
subproject.description: The project supports the production of Regional Human Development Reports for the Arab States. It supports broad development policy dialogue in the region and strengthens the capacity of Arab institutions to provide policy makers with analysis of priority development challenges using the human development concept, methodology and tools.
donor_long: ARAB FUND FOR ECONOMIC & SOCIAL DEVELOP.
ARAB GULF PROGRAMME FOR UN DEV. ORG.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective

subproject.corporate outcome: Knowledge for human development in the Arab region strengthened
subproject.description: As knowledge was one of the deficits identified in first the Arab Human Development Report, the main outcome of the Arab Knowledge Report is strengthening knowledge for human development in the Arab region. The Report will independently analyze and monitor trends and issues affecting knowledge in the Arab world.
